scripts.prepare:base: rm -rf html && mkdir html && cp -a .vuepress/ html/.vuepress/ && mv html/.vuepress/README.md html/
scripts.prepare:ipldsch:
cd html && find . -name \*.ipldsch -exec sh -c "echo '---
editLink: false
---

\`\`\`ipldsch' > {}.md && cat {} >> {}.md && echo '\`\`\`' >> {}.md" \;
scripts.prepare:json:
find html/ -name \*.json -exec sh -c "echo '---
editLink: false
---

\`\`\`json' > {}.md && cat {} >> {}.md && echo '\`\`\`' >> {}.md" \;
scripts.build: set -e; for t in prepare:base prepare:content prepare:ipldsch prepare:json build:vue; do npm run $t; done
scripts.serve:
echo '

[1mView IPLD Specs @ http://localhost:1337/[22m

'; npx st --dir html/.vuepress/dist --no-cache --index index.html
